name: Gerald Smith's Orggannick Adventure
description:
Welcome to Gerald Smith's Orggannick Adventure, a kind-of-RPG made in Game Maker 8 with farming sim elements, boss battles and a story!

Play as a farmhand (Farmhat) working for Gerald himself, and complete tasks to make progress!

BUT THERE'S MORE...

  • A killer robot scarecrow
  • Rival farmers, one of which is a literal toilet
  • A town with its own monarchy in the sewers
  • The Baguette Woman
  • ...... and perhaps something darker...

INTERESTED?!?!?!

...no?

DOWNLOAD THE GAME TODAY!!!

- Credits -

Team Orggannick presents

A Gerald Smith game

Concept art by OrggannickFarmer, Frizz and Yui

Original characters by OrggannickFarmer, Frizz and FrickFrack

(List subject to change, full credits with special thanks in game)
